attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe all school leavers should do a 3 years national service, this would give all youngsters discipline and respect for people and theyre property (less ASBOs) also less drug use hopefully better security for our country with full military training

rejection.details: The title should be a request for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
